name: OpenRouter
description: Unified API gateway for many frontier and open models with routing and pricing controls.

name: Hugging Face Inference API
description: Hosted inference for thousands of models across NLP, vision, and audio.

name: Replicate
description: Run open-source models in the cloud with simple APIs and deployments.

name: Ollama
description: Run and manage LLMs locally with one-line model pulls.

name: Mistral API
description: High-performance open-weight and commercial LLMs with competitive pricing.

name: Gemini API
description: Google's multimodal models for text, image, and tooling.

name: Together AI
description: Inference and fine-tuning platform for open models with competitive throughput.

name: Groq API
description: Ultra-low-latency LPU inference for Llama and Mixtral models.

name: Fireworks AI
description: High-throughput inference and fine-tuning for open-source models.

name: LM Studio (local)
description: Desktop app to run, compare, and serve local LLMs.

name: GPT4All (local)
description: Open-source local LLM ecosystem with desktop apps and SDKs.

name: KoboldCpp
description: Fast CPU/GPU backend for running LLMs locally with UI integrations.

name: LMQL
description: Query language for LLMs enabling constrained and structured generation.

name: Text Generation Web UI
description: Popular web UI for running and chatting with local text-generation models.

name: Perplexity API
description: Answer engine API combining retrieval with strong model responses.

name: Google Colab
description: Hosted Jupyter notebooks with free GPUs for ML.

name: Claude
description: AI assistant for chat and reasoning, hosted by Anthropic.

name: ChatGPT
description: Conversational AI by OpenAI, useful for general-purpose chat, QA, and integration.

name: AutoGPT
description: Open-source autonomous agent framework that orchestrates LLMs to perform multi-step tasks.

name: AutoGen (Microsoft)
description: Multi-agent orchestration framework from Microsoft for building LLM-powered workflows and applications.

name: LangChain
description: Framework for building applications with LLMs by chaining prompts, agents, and memory together.

name: LlamaIndex (formerly GPT-Index)
description: Indexing and data-connector library to connect LLMs to external data sources for retrieval-augmented generation.

name: VLLM
description: High-performance LLM inference engine for faster CPU/GPU batched inference.

name: GooseAI
description: Managed service and model host providing access to various foundation models and inference endpoints.

name: Langflow
description: Visual builder for LLM chains and flows — drag-and-drop interface for LangChain-compatible components.

name: Letta
description: Conversational AI framework designed to build chat experiences and conversational agents.

name: Apidog
description: API testing platform (with AI-assisted features) for designing, testing, and documenting APIs.

name: Qodo
description: AI assistant focused on code completion, refactorings and code understanding (developer-facing).

name: DeepSeek
description: AI-powered semantic search and reasoning product that enables building powerful search experiences.

name: Google Gemini
description: Google’s family of large multimodal models and APIs for chat, images, and coding assistance.

name: NotebookLM
description: Google’s research assistant that helps you ask questions and get answers from documents and notes.

name: Qwen Code CLI
description: Open-source command-line AI workflow tool adapted from Gemini CLI, optimized for Qwen3-Coder models, for code editing, automation, and agentic tasks.
